channel.title: zola on bigelectrons
channel.description: Recent content in zola on bigelectrons

item.title: Moved from Blogger to GH Pages
item.description: I have been documenting so far with Blogger. Recently I started to do some Robotics projects with ROS. As I was doing it, I was looking for ways to get all what I do be documented. I know Github offers GH Pages, but I was a bit reluctant to try it out. So for the Navo project, I decided that GH Pages will be the source for my documentation, hence I wanted to give it a try.
